import { useState } from 'react' import { useNavigate, useLocation } from 'react-router-dom' import { useAuth } from './auth' function Login() { const [user, setUser] = useState('') const navigate = useNavigate() const location = useLocation() const auth = useAuth() const redirectPath = location.state?.path || '/' const handleLogin = () => { auth.login(user) navigate(redirectPath, { replace: true }) } return (

) } export default Login
